paper.title: A Pragmatical Option Pricing Method Combining Black-Scholes Formula, Time Series Analysis and Artificial Neural Network
paper.abstract: Although many theoretical methods were developed to price various derivatives, pricing deviation still remains very high. This paper provides a pragmatical option pricing method by combining skewness and kurtosis adjusted BlackScholes model of Corrado and Su, time series analysis and Artificial Neural Network (ANN). The empirical tests in FTSE 100 Index options show that pricing deviation calculated by adjusted Black-Scholes model is still high. After the model is modified by time series analysis and ANN methods, the pricing deviation is reduced, which is much smaller than the previous models. It is suggested that time series analysis and Artificial Neural Network methods can be used in the pragmatical work to make the pricing more fast and precise.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是结合Black-Scholes模型、时间序列分析和人工神经网络来改进期权定价的准确性，这直接属于衍生品定价领域。论文明确提到其目标是减少定价偏差，并通过实证测试验证了方法的有效性。
